Class DefaultSQLContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.io.sql.DefaultSQLContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SQLContext
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultSwingSQLContext, SequentialSQLContext

    public class DefaultSQLContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements SQLContext
    Represents a default SQL context.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
